name: anticipatedArrivalInformation
description: A (Anticipated arrival information). If entry type = 21, then repeat PG30 and enter F (Foreign Trade Zone)

name: anticipatedArrivalDateAtPortOfEntry
description: A numeric date in MMDDCCYY (month, day, century, year) format. Mandatory if Status = “A”.

name: anticipatedArrivalTimeAtPortOfEntry
description: Military time HHMM in (hour, minute) format. (Example: 1015, this represents 10:15 a.m.). For midnight, use 2400 (0000 is invalid). Mandatory if Status = “A”.

name: inspectionOrArrivalLocationCode
description: Only a value of “4” (=FIRMS Code) is allowed for entry type = 21. For entry type not = 21, this field is left blank.

name: inspectionOrArrivalLocation
description: Provide FIRMS code here. For valid FIRMS codes, refer to ACS/ACE query. https://www.cbp.gov/document/report/acs-public-firms-code-report
